text: Job Details: Stand approximately 18-20 inches from the conveyor. Use both hands, grab the live chicken by the legs, being careful not to hurt the chicken or break any part. Lift the chicken and turn it upside down with the breast facing away. Keep all shackles full. Wear all required safety equipment. You must have good eye/hand coordination. Any other task assigned by the Supervisor. You must be able to back up all other positions. Must be able to perform essential work functions to the standard within 10 days. You must be able to work at a fast pace throughout the shift. You must be able to work flexible hours and some weekends as production requires. Must be able to work in a cold, hot, humid and dusty environment. You must observe all required hygiene and safety procedures at all times. You must be able to stand throughout the shift. The job requires bending, lifting, twisting and turning. You must set an example for other team members in complying with all policies and good support. Párese aproximadamente a 18-20 pulgadas del transportador. Use ambas manos, agarre el pollo vivo por las piernas, teniendo cuidado de no lastimar al pollo ni romper ninguna parte. Levante el pollo y gírelo boca abajo con la pechuga hacia el otro lado. Mantenga todos los grilletes llenos. Use todo el equipo de seguridad requerido. Debe tener una buena coordinación ojo/mano. Cualquier otra tarea asignada por el Supervisor. Debe poder realizar una copia de seguridad de todas las demás posiciones. Debe poder trabajar a un ritmo rápido durante todo el turno. Debe poder trabajar en horarios flexibles y algunos fines de semana según lo requiera la producción. Debe ser capaz de trabajar en un ambiente frío, caliente, húmedo y polvoriento. Debe observar todos los procedimientos de higiene y seguridad requeridos en todo momento. Debe poder estar de pie durante todo el turno. El trabajo requiere doblar, levantar, torcer y girar. Debe dar ejemplo a otros miembros del equipo para cumplir con todas las políticas y un buen soporte. Relocation Assistance Eligible: No. Work Shift: 1ST SHIFT (United States of America) Hourly Applicants ONLY -You must complete the task after submitting your application to provide additional information to be considered for employment.

Tyson is an Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer. All qualified applicants will be considered without regard to race, national origin, color, religion, age, genetics, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or veteran status.
We provide our team members and their families with paid time off; 401(k) plans; affordable health, life, dental, vision and prescription drug benefits; and more.
